com.quantcomponents.algo
Interface IOrderReceiver

All Known Subinterfaces:
IExecutionService, ISimulatedExecutionService, ITradingAgentExecution
All Known Implementing Classes:
DummyTradingAgentExecution
public interface IOrderReceiver

Low-level interface that groups the methods to send orders to execution services

Method Summary
 String[] sendBracketOrders(IOrder parent, IOrder[] children)
          Sends a bracket order, and retrieves corresponding order IDs for them.
 String sendOrder(IOrder order)
          Send an order to the execution service, and retrieve the corresponding order ID from it.
 

Method Detail

sendOrder

String sendOrder(IOrder order)
                 throws ConnectException,
                        RequestFailedException
Send an order to the execution service, and retrieve the corresponding order ID from it. The order ID should be written to the order instance by the caller.

Parameters:
order - an order to be executed. The ID parameter IOrder.getId() is ignored. This parameter is not changed
Returns:
an ID for the order, generated by the execution service, to be written to the order instance by the caller
Throws:
ConnectException
RequestFailedException

sendBracketOrders

String[] sendBracketOrders(IOrder parent,
                           IOrder[] children)
                           throws ConnectException,
                                  RequestFailedException
Sends a bracket order, and retrieves corresponding order IDs for them. The children orders are conditionally processed only if the parent order has been executed.

Parameters:
parent - parent order
children - child orders, activated only after the parent order has been executed
Returns:
an array of IDs, with the parent order ID in the first position, and the child order IDs in the respective following positions
Throws:
ConnectException
RequestFailedException
